title: Remove all '0% tax' references from the site

requirements.summary: Remove all visible '0% tax', '0 percent tax', '0% buy & sell tax', 'zero tax', and equivalent phrasing from every frontend component, including TokenomicsSection, TickerBanner, HeroSection, AboutSection, HowToBuySection, Navigation, CommunitySection, and Footer
acceptanceCriteria: No visible text on any page section contains '0% tax', '0% buy & sell tax', '0 percent tax', 'zero tax', or any equivalent phrasing.
The TickerBanner marquee contains no tax-related phrases.
The TokenomicsSection contains no tax-related card, badge, or label.
All other components (Hero, About, Navigation, Footer, Community) are free of any 0% tax references.
No layout breakage occurs from removing the text; surrounding elements reflow cleanly.

file_operations.description: Remove all '0% tax', '0 percent tax', '0% buy & sell tax', 'zero tax', or equivalent phrases from the marquee banner phrases array. Ensure the remaining phrases still flow naturally in the ticker animation without gaps or awkward spacing.

Remove any tokenomics card, badge, label, or text element that displays '0% tax', '0% buy & sell tax', 'zero tax', or equivalent phrasing. If a dedicated tax card exists, remove it entirely. Update the grid layout if necessary to accommodate the removal without breaking the visual structure.

Audit the headline, tagline, badge text, and any tooltip or overlay elements for '0% tax', '0 percent tax', 'zero tax', or equivalent phrases. Remove all matches. Ensure the hero section remains visually balanced after the removal.

Scan all body copy, badge text, and floating element labels for '0% tax', '0% buy & sell tax', 'zero tax', or equivalent phrasing. Remove all instances. Verify that the humorous meme-coin copy remains cohesive without the removed text.
Check all step descriptions, tips, and callout text for '0% tax', '0 percent tax', 'zero tax', or equivalent phrases. Remove any matches. Ensure the three-step guide flow remains clear and complete.

Inspect the navigation links, logo alt text, CTA button labels, and mobile menu items for '0% tax', '0% buy & sell tax', 'zero tax', or equivalent phrasing. Remove all instances. Confirm the navigation bar layout remains intact.

Review the community card copy, CTA banner text, and button labels for '0% tax', '0 percent tax', 'zero tax', or equivalent phrases. Remove all matches. Ensure the CTA banner and community card remain visually cohesive.

Audit the legal disclaimer, quick-links text, brand tagline, and any tooltip or footnote text for '0% tax', '0% buy & sell tax', 'zero tax', or equivalent phrasing. Remove all instances. Verify the footer layout and disclaimer readability remain intact.
